name: Just in Case
description:
Just in Case is a short game about the everyday experience of getting home at night.

It aims to raise awareness of the lack of freedom women face on daily activities.

WARNING: This game portrays harassment and violent scenarios which could be distressing. It's not meant to be a light-hearted experience. Please don't play this game if you think it could trigger negative thoughts damaging to your well-being.

Play time: 5-10 minutes.

Go Fullscreen for a full experience.

Cover picture: "Building entrance, Berlin" by KoppCorentin licensed under CC BY-NC-ND 2.0
